channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: Call for CELI exams CELI 1 (A2) - CELI 2 (B1) - CELI 3 (B2) - CELI 4 (C1) levels on 26 and 27 June 2025
item.description: The call is open to register for the CELI 1 (A2) - CELI 2 (B1) - CELI 3 (B2) - CELI 4 (C1) exams scheduled on 26 and 27 June 2025.%0AN.B: seats for the CELI 1 A2, CELI 2 B1, CELI 3 B2 and CELI 4 C1 exams are sold out.%0A %0A%0AðŸ“„ Read the call for further details

item.title: Faculty Championship 2025
item.description: To encourage students to participate in the competitions, classes will be suspended on the following dates: %0Aâ€¢ Tuesday, 15 April 2025 ONLY for students of the LITA campus in Segrate (from 11 am onwards)%0A%0Aâ€¢ Wednesday, 21 May 2025 for all students of the Faculty of Medicine (all classes scheduled for the day). %0A%0A
